title: mremoteng crashing when opening new connection file
author: majed17
body_snippet: it seems to be an alergie with win 10 1809, it doesn't matter if it's a virtual machine or a real pc, when trying to open a saved connection file, the program simply disappears when pressing do n ot save current connection file. this was something i noticed months ago and was simply waiting for it to get fixed and now with the march version it still is crashing.

comments.author: kmscode
comments.snippet:
Please try with the latest build: https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/releases/tag/v1.76.19

If the problem still occurs, please provide any logs/crash information associated with the problem:
https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/wiki/Troubleshooting-and-Logging#crash-information

comments.snippet:
Looks like there are problems finding a system class...

We're not doing anything special here, just calling a standard OpenFileDialog:
https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/blob/v1.76.19/mRemoteV1/UI/DialogFactory.cs#L13

Are you using a high contrast theme? Looks like there are some known issues on the MS side, that MIGHT be fixable on our end with a manifest update (which I'll review further). But would be nice to confirm if you're on a high contrast theme....
